name: Preschool
description: The Early Childhood program prepare the classrooms to support a child’s natural curiosity; encourage creativity and aid in cooperative learning. Classroom learning consists of the following areas: - Practical Life - Language - Math - Physical and Life Science - Culture - Art, Music and Movement - Outdoor Environment
